icondataset.icondata: This is a villager. Villagers can build and gather resources.
This is an Infantry Unit.
This is a Cavalry Unit
This is an Archer.
This is a building.
This is a dangerous animal.
This is a harmless animal.
This is a Myth Unit.
This unit is effective at killing Infantry Units.
This unit is effective at killing Archery Units.
This unit is effective at knocking down buildings.
This unit is effective at killing Cavalry Units.
This unit is effective at killing Myth Units.
Focus on infantry and heroes. Zeus grants stronger infantry
Focus on archers and buildings. Hades grants a trickle of Gold.
Focus on cavalry. Poseidon grants cheaper cavalry and better trade.
Hermes has granted increased line of sight for your buildings.
Ares has granted decreased cost for your military buildings.
Athena has granted a bonus to your Heroes against enemy Myth Units.
Aphrodite has granted increased speed to your Villagers.
Dionysos has granted strength to your Cavalry.
Apollo has granted increased attack to your Archers.
Artemis has granted decreased cost for your Archers.
Hera has granted speed and attack for your archers.
Hephaestus has granted better armor for your soldiers.
Focus on infantry. Isis grants cheap improvements and a full tech tree.
Focus on chariots. Ra grants stronger chariots and Pharaohs.
Focus on archers. Set grants the ability to convert wild animals with Priests and Pharaohs.
Anubis has granted increased speed to your Anubites.
Bast has granted you an increased population cap.
Ptah has granted increased attack to your counter units.
Hathor has granted free goats for you to eat. Nummy Goats.
Nephthys has granted faster gold income.
Sekhmet has granted cheaper archer improvements.
Horus has granted cheaper Spearmen and Axemen.
Osiris has granted you new Gold Mines.
Thoth has granted increased Favor generation.
Focus on Myth Units. Loki grants cheaper Myth Units.
Focus on the Hill Fort. Odin grants Ravens to gather knowledge of your surroundings.
Focus on the Longhouse. Thor grants faster-training infantry.
Forseti has granted increased speed to your lumberjacks.
Heimdall has granted increased line of sight for your units.
Freyja has granted stronger Hersir.
Bragi has granted free Villagers to help you build your empire! Use them wisely, Mortal.
Njord has granted better Dwarves. They now gather and train faster.
Frigg has granted cheaper farms.
Hel has granted lower population for your Myth Units.
Baldr has granted stronger Town Centers.
Tyr has granted stronger Ulfsarks.
